thread.section_title: Tractive Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von Tractive | tractive.com
thread.title: Chris Tuffey

author: Chris Tuffey
title: Chris Tuffey
text:
I highly recommend Tractive service and help.
The only negative i have is to do with the product.
The clip which holds the tracker to the dogs collar is inadequate, ive lost one tracker due to the tracker coming away from the clip while having a flat battery.
While my dogs play fight and bash into things the tracker has become detached on a few occasions.
In my opinion the clip needs improvements made to hold the tracker more securely.
